title: Linux egrep Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the powerful egrep command in Linux, learn how to use regular expressions for efficient text processing, and discover practical examples to enhance your text manipulation skills.

meta.title: Linux egrep Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the powerful egrep command in Linux, learn how to use regular expressions for efficient text processing, and discover practical examples to enhance your text manipulation skills.
meta.keywords: egrep, linux, regular expressions, text processing, text editing, grep, command line, pattern matching

verify.name: Verify egrep usage
verify.hint: Ensure that you can use the egrep command to search for the word "years" in the data.txt file and that the expected output is displayed.

steps.title: Use egrep to Search for Regular Expressions

verify.name: Verify egrep with regular expressions
verify.hint: Ensure that you can use the egrep command with the regular expression pattern '^J\w+' to search the data.txt file and that the expected output is displayed.

steps.title: Combine egrep with Other Linux Commands

verify.name: Verify egrep with other commands
verify.hint: Ensure that you can use the egrep command combined with the wc command to count the number of lines in the data.txt file that contain a number between 20 and 40, and that the expected output is displayed.
